description: A nice, healthy and light soup. Great for using up leftover vegetables lurking in the fridge.
keywords: Soup,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Soy free,Chicken,Cauliflower,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Cauliflower & Vegetable Broth Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup parsley, freshly chopped (or dill, to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Add 3.5 litres of cold tap water. Cover pot with lid and bring soup to the boil.

Reduce heat and simmer for about 90 minutes. You may need to top the water up, as it will evaporate while it simmers. Stir occasionally. Add about 3 heaped tablespoons of Vegeta stock powder at about an hour into the cooking process. Do this gradually (to taste).
Place drumsticks, cauliflower florets, diced potatoes and carrots, whole brown onions and parsley in a large saucepan.
Ladle the soup into bowls. Garnish with fresh chopped parsley or dill. Enjoy.
